Agathion''' could be:
* One of the [[agathia]], [[angel]]ic spirit [[warrior]]s from the [[Outer Planes]]
* The [[Agathion (layer)|lowest layer]] of [[Pandemonium#Agathion|Pandemonium]], as described by the [[Great Wheel cosmology]] model.
